tool_description: An API that will count business days including holidays for the US.
name: DaysAPI
title: DaysAPI

api_list.name: calendar_arithmetic
api_list.description:
This endpoint will take in a date number of years, months, days,
hours, minutes, and seconds as query parameters and return the date
with the addtion or subtraction produced from entered query
parameters.

This endpoint can do addition and subtraction. To do subtraction just add
`-` befor the integer like so `-8` and the endpoint will subtract based
on the query.

**Note**: Please enter properly formatted dates and optionally times.
This endpoint will try and figure out what is entered but will output
incorrect dates and times if date format isn't well formatted.

optional_parameters.name: tz
optional_parameters.description: Time Zone. Timezone must be in [IANA](https://bit.ly/3h8wd73) format.

schema.title: Arithmetic

date_entered.title: Date Entered
date_entered.description: Date enterd to count days from.

interpreted_date.title: Interpreted Date
interpreted_date.description: Interpreted date entered in human readable form.

schema.description: JSON Schema Response model for arithmetic endpoint.

api_list.name: is_weekday
api_list.description:
Endpoint will return True or False of date entered is a weekday.

If date is a Saturday or Sunday, then `false` will be returned.

api_list.name: business_delta
api_list.description:
Given two dates. This endpoint will output the number of business
days between them.

Dates can be entered in any order. Please enter readable dates.
Doesn't have to be ISO or RFC formatted dates.

api_list.name: business_days
api_list.description:
Calculate working days from given date with given number of days.

The timezone is set to US/Eastern due to US banks operate only in
that timezone.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Enter date to add or subtract business days from.You can enter any readable date. Doesn't have to be ISO or RFC formatted.

optional_parameters.name: days
optional_parameters.description: Number of business days. Default is 8 business days.

date_entered.title: Date Entered
date_entered.description: Date to count business days from.

interpreted_date.title: Interpreted Date
interpreted_date.description: Interpreted date enterd to make sure it is correct.

days.title: Days
days.description: Number of business days to count.

api_list.name: is_weekend
api_list.description:
Endpoint will return True if date falls on the weekend, Saturday or
Sunday.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Checks if date given is a weekend.

api_list.name: difference_calendar
api_list.description:
This endpoint takes in two dates and calculates the difference for
you with the queries you enter.

optional_parameters.name: date_two
optional_parameters.description: Second date to get calendar difference

optional_parameters.name: tz_2
optional_parameters.description: Please entered prefered timzone. Use `IANA` format.

optional_parameters.name: tz_1
optional_parameters.description: Please entered prefered timzone. Use `IANA` format.

schema.title: Diff

period_one.title: PeriodOne
period_one.description: JSON Schema Response model for first entered date.

period_two.title: PeriodTwo
period_two.description: JSON Schema Response Mode for second date entered.

difference.title: Difference

words.title: Words
words.default: 4 years 3 months 2 weeks and 1 day til' I'm out!

difference.description: JSON Schema Response model for datetime difference calculation.

schema.description: JSON Schema Response Model for Difference endpoint.
